name: privacy-jenga
description: Interactive 3D Bitcoin Privacy Education Game - Learn Bitcoin privacy concepts through engaging tower mechanics. Inspired by bitcoinjenga.com by Amiti Uttarwar & D++

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install
scripts.clean: cd apps/web && rm -rf dist node_modules && npm install

author: MWANGAZA-LAB (Inspired by bitcoinjenga.com by Amiti Uttarwar & D++)
